Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have a single, L-shaped, yellow-orange hairless patch on my left preauricular skin (the area just in front of the ear), and it used to be smooth but now it seems to be changing.
How long have you been noticing this patch and what changes are occurring to it?
I have had this patch since birth; it has never grown hair, and recently it seems to be changing in texture.
Has anyone in your family had similar skin conditions or other skin issues?
No, there's no family history of similar skin conditions or other skin issues.
Do you have any other symptoms or medical conditions affecting other parts of your body?
No, apart from being born prematurely and having a low birth weight, I am otherwise healthy and don't have symptoms affecting other parts of my body.
Final Diagnosis: Nevus sebaceus.
